name: Army Gunner PRO - Full Combat Version
name_original: Army Gunner PRO - Full Combat Version
description:
** THIS VERSION HAS NO IN GAME ADS **

You are the "best of the best" on a mission to take out a rouge agent. Armed with your sniper rifle, gatling gun and assault rifle, you must survive waves of attacking forces.

Do you have what it takes?

FEATURES

- Realistic 3D Graphics and explosions
- Multiple guns!
- Multiple levels.
- Non stop action!
